snippet.title: Abandon Ship: Major Update 03: The Haunted Seas
snippet.description:
Dare you enter 'The Haunted Seas'? The latest major update for Abandon Ship unlocks a new region, an extra side-story featuring a brand new Captain plus a whole host of systems and content.

Out now Steam Early Access ► http://store.steampowered.com/app/551860

Official Soundtrack available now ► 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/848370/Abandon_Ship__Official_Soundtrack/

FOLLOW US:
Official Website ► http://abandonshipgame.com/ 
Twitter ►  https://twitter.com/GameAbandonShip
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/AbandonShipTheGame/
Discord ► https://discordapp.com/invite/PPgCXVm
YouTube ► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6FGX1jCxMUqdlB_d6KsztQ

Subscribe to our Newsletter and get your name in the game! See http://abandonshipgame.com/your-name-in-the-game for details.
